name: Maygrove
description:
Today, you've been gifted—or perhaps burdened with—the rare chance to walk among the Fae. If there's a reason these capricious beings invited you here, only they know it. But purpose or no, the Maygrove draws you in anyhow...

Made by Christine Fouron and Thomas Sullivan

With assets from Acorn Bringer's Low Poly Nature; Simple Models' BarProps; A3D's Tileable Hand Painted Ground Texture Pack 2; LowlyPoly's Stylized Grass Texture; Yughues Free Ground Materials; and Borodar's Farland Skies-Cloudy Crown.

Special Thanks:

Robert Yang and Matt Boch

Fellow Game Design 1 students
